title: Canada Launched Major Gun Reforms in 2020 After Its Deadliest Mass Shooting
summary_full: The country’s deadliest mass shooting, in Nova Scotia, precipitated the creation of a comprehensive program after 23 people, including the attacker, died.
summary_public: The country’s deadliest mass shooting, in Nova Scotia, precipitated the creation of a comprehensive program after 23 people, including the attacker, died.
